C

callable(Callable<String>) - Method in interface com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core.I18NBindingBuilder.FirstStep
Setter for the developers choose to generate a StringBinding with a function from type Callable<String>.
com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core - package com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
The core package from the library Lib-I18N contains all functionalities to register a ResourceBundle, access the values from the bundle over the keys with optional arguments and bind them through a StringBinding to a StringProperty.
com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.internal - package com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.internal
The internal package from the library Lib-I18N contains on the one side the default implementations from the interfaces from the library core package and on the other side a default validator for precondition checks.
configure() - Static method in class com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core.I18NResourceBundleBuilder
Starting point from this fluent builder to configure a ResourceBundle which key/value pairs will be bind to a Locale.

I

I18NBinding - Interface in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
This Interface gives the developer the possibilities to create a StringBinding which is associated with a key / value pair from a ResourceBundle.
I18NBindingBuilder - Class in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
With the fluent builder I18NBindingBuilder the developer can easily create a StringBinding wrapped into a Optional.
I18NBindingBuilder() - Constructor for class com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core.I18NBindingBuilder
 
I18NBindingBuilder.FirstStep - Interface in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
First mandory step to generate a StringBinding.
I18NBindingBuilder.LastStep - Interface in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
The last step in this fluent builder.
I18NBindingBuilder.SecondStep - Interface in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
Second mandory step to generate a StringBinding if the developer has choosen the option to create a StringBinding with a key.
I18NFacade - Class in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
Over the facade I18NFacade the developer have access to all methods from the interfaces I18NBinding and I18NResourceBundle.
I18NMessageBuilder - Class in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
With the fluent builder I18NMessageBuilder the developer can easily receive the message from the previous defined ResourceBundle in I18NResourceBundleBuilder in association to the I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty().
I18NMessageBuilder() - Constructor for class com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core.I18NMessageBuilder
 
I18NMessageBuilder.FirstStep - Interface in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
First mandory step to received a message (associated value) from the previous configure ResourceBundle in I18NResourceBundleBuilder in dependency from the I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty().
I18NMessageBuilder.LastStep - Interface in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
The last step in this fluent builder which completes the previous configuration steps and returned the corresponding value.
I18NMessageBuilder.SecondStep - Interface in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
Second optional step in this fluent builder.
I18NResourceBundle - Interface in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
This Interface allowed the developer to managed following tasks:
Configuration from the ResourceBundle: Setting the base bundle name for the ResourceBundle.
I18NResourceBundleBuilder - Class in com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core
With the fluent builder I18NResourceBundleBuilder the developer can easily configure the ResourceBundle and the different relevant Locales.
I18NResourceBundleBuilder() - Constructor for class com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core.I18NResourceBundleBuilder
